  • Method Details

    • addReview

      public void addReview(Movie movie, String comments, int rating, MovieGoerAccount movieGoer) throws Exception
      Add new review to a movie
      Parameters:
      movie - movie object to add review to
      comments - review comment
      rating - review rating
      movieGoer - user the review belongs to
      Throws:
      Exception - if the specified user has already made a review on the movie designated

    • hasPreviouslySubmittedReview

      public boolean hasPreviouslySubmittedReview(MovieGoerAccount movieGoer, Movie movie)
      Checks if user specified has previously submitted a review on a particular movie
      Parameters:
      movieGoer - user
      movie - movie object
      Returns:
      true if user has previously submitted a review for the movie, false otherwise

    • getReviews

      public ArrayList<Review> getReviews(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
      Get an arraylist of all reviews for specfied movies
      Parameters:
      movies - arraylist of movie object to retrieve reviews from
      Returns:
      arraylist of all reviews for specified movies
